name: Mages and Mercenaries
description:
Venture your way into a long-abandoned tower with mysteries and creatures lurking around every corner.

Potentially fight cute beasts and solve puzzles with your friends to get the so-longed-for treasure.

W & Spacebar - Jump

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

S - Nothing... Yet

E - Interact

Struggling to pick between characters? Just be both! A paladin with luscious locks and a paladin with questionable but adorable skills, what could go wrong?

A quest can't be complete without a loyal companion. [insert raven's name] will happily help you (if you ask nicely) progress throughout your journey. Just make sure you don't upset him.

  • Solo friendly. Don't have any friends to play with? That's alright, we get it, Neither do we! You can play on your own and still enjoy the game.
  • Puzzles and adorably threatening creatures. Find your way through cooperative puzzles and distracting enemies.
  • Unique characters to play with. Each character has unique features and abilities for you to explore.
  • Original soundtrack. All our tracks were made by our team's audio wizard.

Our team is composed of 6 talented and passionate people.

Daniela, Ryan and Lunala did all the stunning digital artwork.

Shen-Kai (PandaShenpai) coded and pretty much made everything possible.

Bartosz Grzenia did the level design and made sure it looked balanced and consistent.

Jamie composed all the tracks in the game.
